hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="RS-$$-ELK" /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init login /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init build /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init start
#vm image fixup /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init fixup
/puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'wget http://home.zcu.cz/~bodik/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh rediser.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh rsyslog-server.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh elk.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog7_installed.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog-server_netstat.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rediser/tests/rediser.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x elk/tests/elk.sh'
